title: Dam Safety Inspection
description: An engineer is performing a routine safety inspection of a dam.

tasks.description: Retrieve the dam safety inspection checklist from the asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Engineer accesses the standard inspection form on their mobile device.

tasks.description: Visually inspect the dam's structure for any signs of cracking, seepage, or erosion and document the findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Engineer documents observations and takes photos of any areas of concern.

tasks.description: Check the readings from instrumentation like piezometers and settlement monitors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Engineer records the latest instrumentation readings and compares them to historical trends.

tasks.description: Complete and submit the inspection report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Engineer submits the final report, noting that no critical issues were found.
